description: A move to cut the support needed remove an Isle of Man chief minister has passed its first hurdle.
title: Bid to ease ousting Isle of Man chief minister passes first hurdle
title_page: Bid to ease ousting Isle of Man chief minister passes first hurdle - BBC News
maintext: Roger Tomlinson of the Positive Action Group, which has campaigned for the public election of the chief minister, said the change would "create a tension" which would improve the quality of new legislation being passed.
